output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is visible in the post 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly refers to "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3) 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: While the content appears trivial (asking about what Ciolacu eats for lunch), it's part of a broader campaign to humanize the candidate during electoral period 5. Journalism: This is not journalistic content as it doesn't inform or educate about substantial matters 6. Personal opinion: This is not a personal opinion but a sponsored campaign message
The post is particularly concerning because: - It's a paid advertisement - It directly names a presidential candidate - It's running after the end of the presidential campaign period - It's reaching a significant audience (100,001-500,000 estimated audience) - It's being promoted by PSD Dolj, showing organized party involvement

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It's a paid political advertisement - Directly references a presidential candidate - Is being distributed after the campaign period ended - Has significant reach and spending behind it - Is sponsored by a political party organization
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material publicitar platit pe Facebook (ID: 419365714570211) care face referire directa la candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu, dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul, distribuit dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, are un buget de promovare intre 100-199 RON si a ajuns la un public estimat intre 100,001-500,000 persoane, reprezentand o continuare clara a propagandei electorale dupa incheierea acesteia. Postarea face parte dintr-o strategie de umanizare a candidatului, avand hashtag-uri specifice campaniei (#MarcelCiolacu) si fiind sponsorizata de organizatia judeteana a partidului.
